predictions.sentence: Fun fact: Because I thought the market was getting somewhat overheated, I had a very explicitly laid out plan to sell 1.3 rETH at the price equivalent to $4800 ETH (old ATH is $4868 on Binance) and rebuy it at $4300.
predictions.author: Gumba_Hasselhoff
